This stoty can be about 5 characters:

1.Harpy off legendz also called Anna. She is just after her desires. Can transform into a child looking being, red hair, blue feathers, human face.
2.Silver a young boy taken from his home dimension by Shiron the windragon because he saw Shiron in his dimension. Longish ginger hair, black coat 2 sizes two big, blue eyes.
3.Shiron the windragon, looks out for his freind. BIG with white feathety wings, pilot hat and gloves.
4.You(boy)
5.You(girl)
characters can interact they can die but no dead ends e.g 2 paths from 1 chapter that end the story.
Shiron and Harpy can vore but silver and you can only be vored(but you can fight and kill)
NO HARD VORE
people can be wounded as bad as you want but NO HARD VORE
